experience.title: Data Scientist | Consumer Finance | Risk Analytics
experience.description: Developed a Probability of Default model to assess the credit worthiness of the customer for one of the retail portfolios. Captured fraud cases and created risk buckets by analysing the behaviour data on loan defaults.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Worked on a Government-funded project by Bharti Institute of Public Policy aiming to aid farmers with new policies. Analysed how intra-seasonal variability is correlated to crop productivity and livelihood in 5 districts of India.

experience.title: Market Analyst

experience.title: GES Intern
experience.description: Conducted the Global Entrepreneurship Summit(GES) 2018 at IIT Kharagpur with the E-cell team which saw prominent speakers, important workshops and panel discussions related to queries on Entrepreneurship.Publicized the Global Entrepreneurship Summit(GES) 2018 in the city of Udaipur generating total participation of 100+ students from Udaipur and Media coverage was provided through 14 Media articles.
